name: Render an Arnold scene
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using Arnold.

name: Render an Arnold scene with a path file
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using Arnold.  Ensure your scene is exported with a 3ds Max path file (.mxp) with relative paths.

name: VRay CPU - Render a scene
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay.

name: VRay CPU with SAS - Render a scene
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay.

name: VRay CPU with Path file - Render a scene with a path file
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay.  Ensure your scene is exported with a 3ds Max path file (.mxp) with relative paths.

name: VRay CPU DR - Render a scene using Distributed Render
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay.

name: VRay GPU - Render a scene on Azure GPU instances
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay on GPU instances.

name: VRay GPU with SAS - Render a scene on Azure GPU instances
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay on GPU instances.

name: VRay GPU + DR - Render a scene on Azure GPU instances using Distributed Render
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay on GPU instances.

name: VRay GPU + DR with SAS - Render a scene on Azure GPU instances using Distributed Render
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using VRay on GPU instances.
